name: LD44 - Million dollar robot: Fear the forklift
name_original: LD44 - Million dollar robot: Fear the forklift
description:
You are to be sold !

Your life has value, you can increase it by collecting parts but don't get damaged or your price will get hurt. And beware for in the dark lay monsters not to be awaken.

This is a JAM entry for the Ludum dare 44 : Your life is currency

Move your robot in the four cardinal directions using arrow keys or WASD (north is up/left)

Made using :

  • unity 2019.1.0f2
  • Gimp
  • magicaVoxel
  • Ableton Live
